messages.subject: Proposed Database with every child's info
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Thought this might be of concern to you, it starts about half way down the page. Titled [5] Education Agency s Student Tracking Proposal Opposed
messages.messageBody:
Hi
Thought this might be of concern to you, it starts about half way
down the page. Titled [5] Education Agency's Student Tracking Proposal
Opposed


http://www.epic.org/alert/EPIC_Alert_12.07.html

If it's anything like the database proposed in the UK it will have
tentacles everywhere and will infringe privacy much more than it
actually states it will.

For info on what we are fighting in the UK please go to

www.arch-ed.org

I am no mail but might pop back and check group posts on the net.

BWs Elaine (UK)
